entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've taught Ames Miss'd not to mess with Meatlumps.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find the Ragtag named Ames Miss'd and teach him a lesson.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find the Ragtag named Ames Miss'd and teach him a lesson.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Find Ames and Teach Him a Lesson
entries.task02_utterance_wave_1: Right. Who am I beatin' up then?
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You beat up Anita B'ath.  She won't be recovering anytime soon.
entries.task04_start_message: A Ragtag appears from behind a nearby tree.
entries.task04_utterance_wave_1: Nuthin' I love better'n killin' Meatlumps.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Tell the Food Supply Clerk that Ames has been taught a lesson.
